mission.title: Continuum Mission
mission.description: Use Immortalized Crew to ensure the Continuum stays on the correct path. (Placeholder)

potential_rewards.name: Quantum Energy
potential_rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

potential_rewards.name: Dilithium
potential_rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

potential_rewards.name: Legendary Behold
potential_rewards.flavor: A valuable item. Go to the Honor Hall to collect!

quests.name: Race to the Finish
quests.description: Section 31 agents have split ranks, and some believe Mirror Ezri Tigan must die! Help Malcolm Reed arrest her, for her own safety.

quests.name: Saving Smiley O'Brien
quests.description: Repel determined attacks by the Terran Empire, who wish to kill Smiley O'Brien for his role in developing Section 31's nullifier weapon.

stages.text: Defend Smiley O'Brien To The Last

quests.name: Common Ground
quests.description: Jal Haron has returned to demand surrender from the Ferengi Alliance for their crimes against him. Help mend diplomatic relations between them.

quests.name: Cytherian Highway
quests.description: To reach the Cytherian homeworld, you must intiate a controlled subspace distortion—without destroying your ship in the process!

stages.text: Develop AI to Manage Subspace Burst
